topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: TeX/LaTeX

name: TeX Alive
short_description: TeX Alive is a command-line tool for processing Tex/LaTeX documents on a remote server from the client's command line.  This makes a complete TeX setup (like TeXLive) available for just a few kilobytes on the client machine.
